name: ci-failure-recovery
description: CI fails once, then passes - verifies failure count increments and resets after triage creates sub-issues

parent_issue.title: Feature with recoverable CI failure
parent_issue.body:
## Description

A feature that will initially fail CI but can be fixed.

## Requirements

- Implement feature
- Fix any CI failures

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] CI passes after fix
- [ ] Failures count resets to 0
